extendedInfo.description: White Runner | Angry MoonQuickly jump over and roll through obstacles, as fast and as far as you can. Try to beat other players high scores. Go as far as you can and reach distances that haven't been reached before by a human.The most challenging running game ever. You will addict it. You will love it. Enjoy the way you die :).This game can be classified as line runner games or doodle run games. you need to run and run forever.White Runner game will keep your eyes open and attracted because this white stickman needs to keep running as far as possible and you have to help him to avoid that sharp obstacles. Be careful, the angry white moon will keep watching you and will never let you reach the end!.Features:- Spectacular crashes and death effects.- Amazing animated physic enabled character.- Increasing difficulty from easy to bone breaking.- Leaderboard and google game services.- Directly compare yourself against all other players or your friends.- Continue from the last save point.- Nice Collection of music.

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Definitley frustrating dying so much but it gets easier with time!
reviews.author: Misganaye Demeke

reviews.title: Woow
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe how beautiful it is
reviews.author: Tendo Fark

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Addictive gameplay with great effects and nice music
reviews.author: Nawwar Mokayes

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The best running game in the market
reviews.author: Eugene Charles
